description: The work under this contract consists mainly, but not exclusively, of the Cap-Tourmente national wildlife area’s wastewater treatment system upgrade, located near the municipality of Saint-Joachin.
full_summary:
Tenders are invited for the Wastewater Treatment System Upgrade - Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area project.
## Project Details

* **Project Title**: Wastewater Treatment System Upgrade - Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area
* **编号**: 2022-08-29-PW-QCM-034-18347
* **Publication Date**: August 29, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Project Location**: Cap Tourmente National Wildlife Area, near Saint-Joachin
* **Expected Start Date**: October 31, 2022
* **Expected End Date**: Approximately 40 weeks after start date

## Project Overview
The project involves upgrading the wastewater treatment system at the Cap-Tourmente National Wildlife Area. The work includes, but is not limited to:
* Installation of a prefabricated concrete septic tank
* Installation of a prefabricated concrete tank for a biological reactor
* Replacement of two culverts
* Work on two pump stations
* Performance testing upon reopening to the public

## Tenders and Bid Requirements

* Tenders must be submitted electronically using the Canada Post Corporation (CPC) Connect service.
* Hard copy bids will not be accepted.
* Bidders must provide a bid security with their tender.
* A site visit is not planned.
* Enquiries must be submitted in writing to Jennifer Kirouac, Supply Specialist, at jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Trade Agreements and Languages
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Services will be acquired in both official languages, in accordance with the Official Languages Act.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Jennifer Kirouac, Supply Specialist
* **Email**: jennifer.kirouac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: (418) 953-4110
* **Fax**: Not available
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

## Attachments
Documentation related to this project is available through the Canada Buy Service at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The bid package includes the following documents:
* Bid solicitation
* Amendments
* Attachments

## Tender Closing Notice
